title: Gazing at Angels
description: Sparkling with humor and honesty, award-winning poet Jennifer DiMarco (Seasons of Fire) welcomes us into arguingly the most powerful and private time in a woman's life -- the birth of a first-born child. Beautifully complimented with full-color family shots by Cris Newport (Mirror Up to Nature), 'Gazing at Angels' is a book to be treasured by parents, grandparents, and anyone looking to rejoice.
author: Jennifer Dimarco
